name: Afelhem
description: You are an adventurer seeking to explore the great world of Afelhem. Fight thousands of tough monsters, delve into depths of dangerous dungeons to challenge even stronger bosses and claim your glorious treasure!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/Windows 7/Windows 8/Windows 10 Processor: 1.7+ GHz or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 128mb Video Memory DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 250 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8/8.1, 10 Processor: Dual Core 3.0 Ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 256mb Video Memory DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 250 MB available space
